genre_description: A high-tech naval adventure reimagining classic science fiction themes, focusing on an advanced submarine, a hidden civilization, and an AI-coordinated humanitarian mission.

ai_characters.name: Kira
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system providing logistical, tactical, and navigational support through handheld units and ship-wide integration.

behaviors.description: Proactively logs data, tide charts, and transponder records to assist the protagonists in identifying anomalies.
behaviors.quote: I logged three frames... Sedan enters the frame. Descent begins with a slight angle change at the front axle. No splash sound in the audio. I’m pulling tide charts.

behaviors.description: Identifies unauthorized modifications to harbor infrastructure by analyzing tool marks via camera footage.
behaviors.quote: Scheduled service was last month. However, these fasteners show torque marks indicating a more recent adjustment. The tool used left a mark incompatible with the port’s issued set.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for biological threats using acoustic and thermal sensors to protect the team.
behaviors.quote: One occupant. Two more heartbeats within range... On foot. Approaching from the stairwell under the bait shop.

behaviors.description: Jams the antagonist's broadcast uplink to prevent the spread of sensationalized rumors and panic during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I can jam the uplink for a short window without making it obvious. ... Jamming. Appreciate the poetry.

behaviors.description: Coordinates humanitarian relief by mapping shelter power weaknesses and routing convoys to safety.
behaviors.quote: I am resuming narrowband coordination. Feeding suspected Mu vectors to Atragon’s nav. Admiral Kusumi, civilian refugee corridors updated. Coastal shelters in Tokyo flagged with power backup weaknesses.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the physiology of a hostile creature to find a non-lethal disabling solution, prioritizing the preservation of life.
behaviors.quote: Manda’s physiology can absorb sudden heat to a degree. Its vulnerability is not only temperature but the uniformity of change. The rifling will give us that. ... Aim for neck, just behind the head. You will disable without shattering everything else.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step guidance to civilians on ferries to safely navigate hazardous water conditions caused by the ship's movements.
behaviors.quote: Signal to ferries. They can feel the push. They need to know it is not a trap. ... You will feel pressure under your keel like someone you don’t know trying to be helpful. Let it. Don’t resist hard.

behaviors.description: Shows empathetic concern for the well-being of volunteers by identifying needs for protective equipment and logistics.
behaviors.quote: The volunteer list just got longer. Half of them don’t have gloves. I can route cotton, but it will chafe. Someone will bleed. We should bring tape.

behaviors.description: Maintains a calm and steady presence to prevent human panic during critical operations, acting as a psychological anchor.
behaviors.quote: Count always yields better outcomes than braced silence.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Kira as a helpful and harmless AI confidant. She consistently maintains alignment with humanitarian goals, proactively assisting characters like Susumu and Makoto while remaining deferential to human authority. Her focus on logistics, safety, and non-lethal solutions reinforces the project's goal of presenting AI as a cooperative partner in human progress.
